renderpass.code:
#define H(s)  fract(1e4*sin(i*vec4(R-17.,R+17.)-s))  // 4 random numbers, seed s
#define S(v)  O += smoothstep(2./R.y,0.,v)           // AA draw

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy, A,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y;                     // normalized coordinates
    vec4  H,h; 
          
    if (iMouse.z<=0.)                                // 6-rot symmetry + miror
      U = length(U) * cos( abs( mod( atan(U.y,U.x), 1.05) - .525 ) - .525  + vec2(0,11) );
    O *= 0.;
    
    for( float d, i=0.; i++ < 40.; )                 // loop on objects
      H = H(17.7) + .2,                              // compute location:
      A =   ( iTime/3. + 6.28*H.y )                  //   random angle
          * ( H.zw *2. - 1. ),                       //   random speed
      h =  H(3.1),
      d = length( H.x*vec2(cos(A.x),sin(A.y)) - U )  // circle at random dist + radius
          - .2*h.x,
      S(abs(d)),                                     // draw
        h.y<.3 ? S(abs(d-.02))                       // sometime add echo
      : h.y<.6 ? S(d) *.1 : O;                       // sometime fill
      
    O = sqrt(O);                                     // to sRGB
}
